name: uncombined
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
existing separately and not combined with other things: Silicon does not occur uncombined in nature. Every medicinal substance must be administered in a state of the most perfect purity, and uncombined with any other.
More examplesFewer examplesSometimes the elements are found free; that is, they are uncombined with other elements. It combines with the chlorine to form sodium chloride, leaving the titanium uncombined.A few metals are so unreactive that they occur in an uncombined state. As the disorder progresses, the political actions previously combined become uncombined.
